DOC.brief_summary: The SAMBA study aim assess safety cost comparison management outpatient alcohol detoxification , advance nurse protocol one hand ( experimental group ) , GP-based treatment hand ( standard-of-care group ) . In advanced nurse ( AN ) group , nurse manage alcohol detox use predefined protocol base Cushman CIWA-Ar scale . Depending Cushman CIWA-Ar score , calculate every consultation , advance nurse adjust diazepam dose . In case serious adverse event uncontrolled withdrawal complication , addiction specialist stand back-up appealed decide whether outpatient detox continue whether patient hospitalize . In GP group , GPs manage patient wish .
DOC.brief_title: Advanced Nurses vs. General Practitioners Management Outpatient Alcohol Detox : Safety Cost Comparison
